title: End-to-End Secrets Security: Making a Plan to Secure Your Machine Identities
description: At the heart of every application are secrets. Credentials that allow human-to-machine and machine-to-machine communication. Machine identities outnumber human identities by a factor of 45-to-1 and represent the majority of secrets we need to worry about.
